CHAT.comment: JESSE JAY MONTEJO, Petitioner v. LOUISIANA.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:14 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD B. VERRILLI, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KATHRYN W. LANDRY ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD B. VERRILLI, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
